name: Subway Surfers PC
description:
There are multiple characters in game. The player has to run in between three railway tracks. A policeman run behind the main player to catch him. You have to avoid obstacles coming in between tracks. Either you have to jump or you need to roll to pass below the barrier.

While moving the player has to collect coins and boosters. This money can help to buy new powers. Which can ease the running. So I hope you are excited for Subway Surfers Download. The game is portable and just click to play. Game was developed by Studio Kiloo. This game is small in size. But it is really amazing game. If you like these type of games.

Controls

  • Left Click + Drag Up – [JUMP]
  • Left Click + Drag Down – [Roll]
  • Left Click + Drag Left – [Left]
  • Left Click + Drag Right – [Right]
Features of Subway Surfers
  • Highly Addictive Game Play.
  • Engaging Story.
  • Buy Power Boosters.
  • Choose From Multiple Characters.
  • Play with Keyboard or Mouse.
  • New Levels and Difficulty Level Increase.
  • Sounds and Background game music is also good.
  • Multiple Screen Resolutions Supported
